item.title: Focusing on What Matters
item.description: In an introductory computer science course, our professor instructed us: Don’t become attached to any IDE, text editor, programming language, or operating system. This field is young and constantly evolving; you don’t want to be left behind. I don’t think I realized at that time what tremendously insightful advice this was. At that time I was primarily writing Java in Eclipse. Over the next few years I would work professionally in PHP and Ruby and then later migrate to Elixir.
